name: LA Survive
description:
ENGLISH

LA Survive

LA Survive is an exciting FPS game. Your objective is to defeat all the hordes of enemies before they reach your base. To achieve the best results, strategically choose your enemies. Dont shoot to dancers! test yourself to see how many waves of enemies you can handle.

[BUILD TURRETS ON DEVELOP]

Good Luck!

Controls
Mouse
Press F to use weapon

Credits
